New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 10 月 1 日，星期二 06:14:45 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Hawke’s Bay’s biggest horse race transferred to Waikato https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bays-biggest-horse-race-transferred-to-waikato/NRTA6GXSXRC6BBQWR62AURC774/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bays-biggest-horse-race-transferred-to-waikato/NRTA6GXSXRC6BBQWR62AURC774/ Doug LaingWhen a horse slipped in Race 1 in Hastings on Saturday, it was the beginning of the end, Tue, 01 Oct 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Track inspection after the first race in Hastings on Saturday, leading to the abandonment of the rest of the day's racing and ultimately a decision to transfer Hawke's Bay's biggest annual race day, on October 12, to Waikato track Te Rapa. Photo / Peter Rubery, Race Images
